alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 6:05PM MDT until October 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... Southwestern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... Northwestern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Loving County in western Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/. * At 704 PM CDT/604 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Mentone, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mentone and Slash Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
